text: ladies and gentlemen please welcome
Tiffani Trump families are always on
stage and on people's minds during a

tonight and say a few words about my

I'm Michael Barbera a national political

and straightforward and symbolic in the
case of the trumps they've taken on a

much that's my father the kids are not

loving tender father they're in some

this is unusual
